costing

Class ModuleCosting

  • java.lang.Object
    • costing.ModuleCosting

  • public class ModuleCosting
extends java.lang.Object
    This class aims at calculating the capital cost of the distillation equipment based on the module costing method. All equations and correlation coefficients were taken from Annex A from Turton et al. (1998) and from Ulrich (1984).
